Key Arguments: The proposed legislation may erode freedoms currently enjoyed in Australia.
Concerns about bureaucrats from ACMA deciding what is misleading or deceptive content.
Belief that many things can be subjective and should not be decided by a single group.
Notable Quotes: I fear that this Bill will erode the freedoms that we currently enjoy in Australia.
I am strongly against bureaucrats from the ACMA deciding what is misleading or deceptive content.
